articles.title: President of Tatarstan Meets DPRK Ambassador to Russia
articles.content:
President of Tatarstan Meets DPRK Ambassador to Russia
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Hyong Jun, DPRK ambassador to Russia, paid a courtesy call on Rustam Minnikhanov, president of the Republic of Tatarstan of the Russian Federation, on September 5.
					 The president said that he visited the DPRK in March 2014 and witnessed the reality of Juche Korea leaping forward under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He hoped for peace and stability on the Korean peninsula before expressing the will to further develop the traditional Russia-DPRK friendship by boosting exchange and cooperation between Russia and the DPRK.

articles.title: Spokesman for CPRC Derides Park Geun Hye Group's Nonsensical Talk
articles.content:
Spokesman for CPRC Derides Park Geun Hye Group's Nonsensical Talk
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country (CPRC) of the DPRK gave an answer to the question raised by KCNA Monday blustering the Park Geun Hye group of south Korea for trumpeting about "contingency in the north" in a bid to mislead public opinion.
					 The statement said that the Park group of traitors is recklessly talking nonsense like psychopaths, utterly fear-stricken by the daily-growing might of the DPRK, adding that this is a ridiculous attitude of political illiterates bereft of elementary commonsense and ability to judge the situation.
					
					 As for the defectors from the north who spouted a litany of lies as evidence proving "contingency in the north", they are the despicable criminals who fled to south Korea after betraying the country and their parents and brothers and sisters for fear of facing legal punishment for the serious crimes committed by them.
					
					 It is quite natural that such human scum are gathering in such rotten and corrupt south Korean society.
					
					 It is south Korea that is facing the danger of collapse of its social system and contingency as the people's resentment and anger are on the verge of eruption due to the Park group's sycophancy, treachery, confrontation with fellow countrymen in the north, fascist dictatorship and unpopular rule. 
					
					 The plight of the Park group of traitors is so wretched that they are harboring the daydream of "collapse of the north", unaware of their fate like a candle flickering in the wind.
					
					 Park Geun Hye and her group can neither properly see nor understand till their doom's day the eye-opening reality of the DPRK fully demonstrating its dignity and might as a nuclear power, socialist power in the East by dint of harmonious whole of the leader, the party and the masses.
					
					 The Park group had better properly foresee their miserable fate and stop talking nonsense.

articles.title: DPRK FM Leaves to Take Part in Int'l Meetings
articles.content:
DPRK FM Leaves to Take Part in Int'l Meetings
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- Ri Yong Ho, foreign minister of the DPRK, and his party left here Monday to participate in a ministerial meeting to be held before the 17th Non-aligned Summit and the 71st UN General Assembly.

articles.title: Assistant Administrator of UNDP Here
articles.content:
Assistant Administrator of UNDP Here
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- Haoliang Xu, assistant administrator and director, Regional Bureau for Asia and the Pacific, UNDP, and his party arrived here Monday.

articles.title: Delegations of Juche Idea Study Organizations Leave
articles.content:
Delegations of Juche Idea Study Organizations Leave
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, a delegation of the Nepali Literary Forum for the Study of Songun Politics, a delegation of the Nepalese Association for Supporting the Songun Politics, a delegation of the Italian Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea and a delegation of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand left here Monday after winding up their visit to the DPRK on its 68th founding anniversary.
					 Earlier, a director of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and his party departed here.

articles.title: Reply to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
articles.content:
Reply to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a reply message from Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic, on September 11.
					 The Syrian president in his reply message said that he very thankfully received warm message of greeting sent by Kim Jong Un on his 51st birthday.
					
					 He expressed thanks to Kim Jong Un for his sincere feelings toward the people of Syria and his wishes for their peace and stability.
					
					 He highly appreciated Kim Jong Un for supporting the Syrian people striving to eliminate terrorism and its forces.
					
					 He said he valued very much the invariable stand of Kim Jong Un supporting Syria's just cause and wishing Syria security and stability despite ordeals.
					
					 He wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and the people of the DPRK greater progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy from Cambodian King, Great Queen
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy from Cambodian King, Great Queen
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- Cambodian King Norodom Sihamoni and Great Queen Norodom Monineath Sihanouk sent large floral baskets to the DPRK Embassy in Phnom Penh on September 7 on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Upon authorization of the king and the great queen, a delegation of the Cambodian Ministry of Royal Palace led by Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister for Royal Palace, laid the large floral baskets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from General Association of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from General Association of Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory letter from the General Association of Koreans in China on Sept. 10.
					 The letter said:
					
					 The Koreans in China are full of great happiness and joy and national pride and honor upon the news that scientists and technicians of the Nuclear Weapons Institute in the homeland succeeded in nuclear warhead explosion test for the judgment of the power of a nuclear warhead newly studied and manufactured by them at the northern nuclear test ground.
					
					 The successful test was the great event, event of national history as it demonstrated to the whole world the fact that the work for mounting nuclear warhead on ballistic rockets has entered a higher stage.
					
					 Reflecting the unanimous wishes of all Korean citizens in China and other compatriots the General Association of Koreans in China extends the highest glory and greatest thanks to you who made sure that the DPRK ranked itself among the full-fledged world nuclear powers and turned into an invincible military power and thus demonstrated the dignity of the Korean nation to the whole world.
					
					 The Koreans in China would uphold you as the sun of the nation, head of a reunified country in one mind, deeply cherishing the pride and honor of being members of nuclear power-Songun Korea in the East.
					
					 The General Association of Koreans in China would become genuine patriotic organization making tangible contribution to the reunification, prosperity and development of the homeland.

articles.title: May 21 Architectural Festival, Symposium on Architectural Aesthetics to Be Held
articles.content:
May 21 Architectural Festival, Symposium on Architectural Aesthetics to Be Held
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- The 16th May 21 Architectural Festival and the 11th Symposium on Architectural Aesthetics on the theme of "Highest civilization on highest level" will be held here from September 20 to 23.
					 Participating in the events will be officials and working people of architect designing, building, building materials, supervision, scientific research and education institutions and relevant units across the country.
					
					 The festival will be divided into the architect design exhibition, building material exhibition, construction tools exhibition, construction design modernization contest and scientific paper presentation.
					
					 At the symposium the participants will probe the fact that model architects to which the Juche character and national identity are applied have been built in formative art and peculiar way to befit the appearance of the highly civilized socialist nation under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un. Also to be discussed at the symposium will be the principled issues to be held fast in architect creation.
					
					 The festival and symposium will become a significant occasion for the officials and other working people in the field of construction to thoroughly apply the Party's Juche-based idea of architect and put the architect of the country on a higher stage and swap the achievements and experience.

articles.title: World First Aid Day Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
World First Aid Day Marked in DPRK
Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- An event to observe World First Aid Day was held at the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace Monday.
					Present there were officials of the Red Cross Society of the DPRK, school youth and children in Pyongyang, members of a delegation of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies and a delegation of the International Committee of the Red Cross working in the DPRK and staff members of foreign embassies here.
					
					There took place a contest of school youth and children for the first aid.
					
					The participants enjoyed an art performance given by school youth and children.

articles.title: Posters of Pyongyang International Film Festival Produced
articles.content:
Posters of Pyongyang International Film Festival Produced
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- Posters of the 15th Pyongyang International Film Festival were produced.
					 They reflect the aspiration of progressive moviemen of the world to carve out a new ground of film art and strengthen exchange and cooperation among countries.
					
					 Printed on a poster are the letters bearing "The 15th Pyongyang International Film Festival" and "Welcome" and the Tower of the Juche Idea on the bank of the River Taedong and the flag of the festival fluttering in the sky over Pyongyang.
					
					 The poster represented the Korean people's feelings of friendship to foreigners coming to Pyongyang.
					
					 A poster portraying a pigeon flying in the sky with five colored tapes and bearing letters "Independence", "Peace" and "Friendship" represents the idea of the festival and the desire of progressive mankind to live in a peaceful and independent world.

articles.title: Hygienic and Anti-epidemic Campaign Brisk in Flood-hit Areas
articles.content:
Hygienic and Anti-epidemic Campaign Brisk in Flood-hit Areas
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- All the army and people of the DPRK have turned out as one in a drive to reconstruct the flood-hit areas in the northern part of North Hamgyong Province. 
					 Medical workers are also taking active part in hygienic and anti-epidemic campaign in those areas.
					
					 Officials of the Ministry of Public Health have taken immediate measures to send prophylactic medicines, injectors and other medicines to the areas.
					
					 And big attention has been paid to solving the issue of drinking water in step with the supply of water disinfectant.

articles.title: People Respond to WPK's Call for Recovery from Disaster
articles.content:
People Respond to WPK's Call for Recovery from Disaster
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee recently made an appealing call for all-out battle to recover the disaster areas in northern part of the country's North Hamgyong Province.
					 In hearty response to this call, all the servicepersons and civilians of the DPRK have turned out in a flood damage rehabilitation drive, regarding it as another war to protect the people's happiness and the socialist system.
					
					 According to Jo Po Gun, head of a department of the Cabinet Secretariat, a rehabilitation headquarters was set up to push ahead with the drive on a full scale.
					
					 Dr. Pae Se Hwa, dean of a faculty of Pyongyang University of Architecture, told KCNA:
					
					 The WPK Central Committee put up a slogan "Every effort for the victory in the front of recovering from the flood damage in the northern part of North Hamgyong Province!" This militant slogan recalls us to the fighting spirit displayed during the Fatherland Liberation War and the postwar reconstruction in the 1950s.
					
					 With the slogan, all teachers, researchers and students of the university turned out in a work of drawing out designs for new houses to be built in the flood-hit areas.
					
					 Kim Ki Song, head of the Chongjin Railway Bureau, said that the railway sector should play a key role in the rehabilitation drive, adding:
					
					 All railway stations in Chongjin City are seething with trains carrying cement and other building materials, foodstuffs, medicines and clothes from industrial establishments and people across the country.
					
					 And construction units are arriving in the flood-hit areas one after another from different parts of the country, including the capital city of Pyongyang.

articles.title: Production on Increase to Heal Flood Damage
articles.content:
Production on Increase to Heal Flood Damage
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- Workers of the Sangwon Cement Complex in the DPRK strive to boost the production for the reconstruction of flood-stricken areas in the northern part of North Hamgyong Province.
					 The complex has produced several hundred more tons than scheduled on a daily average after sending 1 000 tons of cement to those areas. 
					
					 The Chollima Steel Complex has also over-fulfilled its daily quotas by introducing efficient methods in hearty response to an appealing call of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea. Its rolling shop and Posan Iron Works are stepping up the production of iron and steel. 
					
					 Similar achievements have been made at other industrial establishments, true to the WPK's important decision to turn the direction of the main efforts of the ongoing 200-day campaign to the reconstruction of disaster areas in northern part of the country.

articles.title: People-First Principle Is Life and Soul of WPK
articles.content:
People-First Principle Is Life and Soul of WPK
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- A life and death drive is now under way in the areas along the River Tuman in the northern tip of Korea to recover from the severest natural disaster since the liberation of Korea. 
					 The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) sent an appeal to all the party members, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and other people to achieve a miraculous victory in the operations for recovering from the disaster in the northern areas of North Hamgyong Province by dint of the great single-minded unity in view of the prevailing emergency situation.
					
					 The main thrust of the 200-day campaign to glorify this significant year as the one of victors is directed to the sites for recovering from the flood damage in the above-said areas and main units active in major sites are rapidly dispatched to those areas.
					
					 Our Party took an important measure of letting the whole Party and army and all people focus all their efforts on the rehabilitation operations. Even the construction of Ryomyong Street nearing completion was suspended and all construction forces, equipment and materials to be used for it are diverted to those operations. 
					
					 The primary thrust in the rehabilitation campaign is to build dwelling houses for the flood-hit people.
					
					 The WPK made this resolute and unwavering decision because it regards the people-first principle as its life and soul. 
					
					 It is the party representing and protecting the interests of the people and serving them.
					
					 The Party's final purpose is to fully realize the independence of the popular masses and the Party regards it as the overriding principle of its activities to steadily improve the people's living standard.
					
					 From the very day of its founding the Party has enforced the politics of love and trust with the firm political creed of regarding the people as Heaven. 
					
					 The people's wishes have been a barometer and starting point of all thinking and practices and the people's voices have been reflected in the Party's lines, policies and action programmes.
					
					 The nomenclature, army and many monumental edifices were named after the people and the historic tasks of the anti-imperialist, anti-feudal democratic revolution, socialist revolution and building of a powerful socialist country were successfully carried out in conformity with the people's aspiration and will.
					
					 Such people-oriented policies as free medical treatment and free compulsory educational system were consistently enforced even during the Arduous March, the forced march, prompted by the new viewpoint of the WPK that the people's interests precisely mean profitability and no calculation is made in the work for the people.
					
					 An important decision was made to build new dwelling houses for those inhabitants whose houses were expected to come under water though the construction of power stations might be hindered and this principle is abided by as a formula in the field of power station construction. This epic of love could be created only by the WPK which is fully responsible for the destiny of the people.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un made a classical formulation that Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is, in essence, the people-first principle for the first time in history and is adding shine to the new history of prioritizing, respecting and loving the people on this land with warm loving care. 
					
					 The slogan "Everything for the people and everything by relying on them!" reflects the will of Kim Jong Un to let the entire Party make selfless, devoted efforts for the good of the people.
					
					 The miracles performed in the drive to recover from the flood damage that hit Rason last year clearly proved in practice that there is no more urgent emergency for the Party than the pain being suffered by the people and no more important revolutionary work than alleviating their misfortune.
					
					 The flood-hit people and other people across the country turned out as one in the campaign to recover from the disaster with their absolute trust in the Party.
					
					 The WPK will bring the people in the above-said areas a new happier life by working unheard-of miracles in the rehabilitation operations by dint of the great single-minded unity.

articles.title: Mt. Kumgang, World's Famous Mountain
articles.content:
Mt. Kumgang, World's Famous Mountain
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- Mt. Kumgang in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea is well-known to the world for its superb scenery.
					 When climbing Piro Peak of the mountain in September Juche 95 (2006), leader Kim Jong Il expressed admiration at its scenery.
					
					 Mt. Kumgang with an area of 530 square kilometers is located in some areas of Kosong, Kumgang and Thongchon counties of Kangwon Province.
					
					 The mountain consists of more than 12,000 peaks the highest of which is Piro Peak with a height of 1 639 meters.
					
					 The mountain displays picturesque sceneries with high and low peaks, fantastic rocks, deep gorges, falls and ponds, harmonized with seaside and rare trees. It is divided into Outer Kumgang, Inner Kumgang and Sea Kumgang according to its features of regional sceneries.
					
					 Outer Kumgang is characterized by natural beauty of mountains, Inner Kumgang by beauty of valleys and Sea Kumgang by seaside and lake sceneries.
					
					 In the mountain there are at least 2,000 species of plants and many animals, birds and fishes. And it has lots of historical relics and sites, including Phyohun Temple and Podok Temple, which give a glimpse of Korean ancestors' wisdom and architectural art.
					
					 The mountain, which was turned into a cultural resort for the popular masses under the deep care of the peerlessly great persons, has now become one of tourism destinations for the Korean people and foreigners.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Editorially Calls for Directing All Efforts to Campaign for Recovering from Flood Damage
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Editorially Calls for Directing All Efforts to Campaign for Recovering from Flood Damage
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- It is an intention of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) to direct the main thrust of the 200-day campaign to the campaign for recovering from the flood damage in the northern area of North Hamgyong Province and to turn the area into the fairyland in the era of the Workers' Party within this year by dint of army-people great unity, harmonious whole, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an editorial.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The campaign is a gigantic struggle that only the WPK can conduct as it puts the people above all.
					
					 Making selfless, devoted efforts for the good of the people is the mode of existence and the revolutionary climate of the WPK. The Party regards the work for taking care of the people's life in a responsible way as the most important affair and duty and has steadily created legendary stories about love for the people.
					
					 There is no political party in the world like the WPK, the great motherly party which regards the people as Heaven and puts the interests and conveniences of the people above all and considers them as absolute, being responsible for the destiny of the people.
					
					 Only our Party can make such crucial decision of channeling all human, material and technical potentials into the campaign for recovering from the food damage in the northern area of North Hamgyong Province as it upholds the slogan "Let the entire Party make selfless, devoted efforts for the good of the people!"
					
					 Thanks to the great Party's idea of believing in people as in Heaven and its seasoned leadership and service personnel and people all out to respond to the call of the Party, miracles startling the world will be performed in the northern area of the country once again.
					
					 The editorial calls for demonstrating to the world once again the true appearance of the socialist country which forms a large family, holding Marshal Kim Jong Un as the father in high esteem and the might of the single-minded unity around the Party and the leader.

articles.title: U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Bound to Go Bust: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Bound to Go Bust: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- The successful nuclear warhead explosion test recently staged by the scientists and technicians of the DPRK Nuclear Weapons Institute was a solemn declaration that no big power on the earth can dare provoke the DPRK, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 This represents the tremendous national power and might of Juche Korea that has been consolidated despite trials of history and all challenges of the enemies, instilling national pride and honor into the hearts of the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The miraculous successes made in bolstering nuclear force one after another clearly prove that the DPRK has not only the U.S. military bases in Asia-Pacific but also the U.S. mainland in its clutches.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists launch a war of aggression again, failing to clearly understand the military muscle and strategic position of the DPRK, nuclear power and military power in the East, and the firm will of its service personnel and people to settle accounts with the U.S. without fail, the DPRK will not miss the golden chance but put an end to their history of aggression against Korea and blow up the land of America and thus finally root out the source of war on the earth.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' hostile policy toward the DPRK is bound to go bust in the face of the harmonious whole of the Party and masses rallied around the peerlessly Songun brilliant commander, its service personnel and people all out to achieve eternal prosperity of the dignified great Paektusan nation, the power possessed of A- and H-bombs and the might of Juche Korea advancing toward the building of a socialist power.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Raps U.S., S. Korean Puppet Forces for Staging Ridiculous Burlesque
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Raps U.S., S. Korean Puppet Forces for Staging Ridiculous Burlesque
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- An anti-DPRK farce was staged in south Korea with hullabaloo. A "ceremony of marking victory in Inchon landing operation" was held on Wolmi Island on September 9 with warships, helicopters and marine corps of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces and the puppet army involved, a provocative charade reenacting the Inchon landing operation during the Korean war.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary says in this regard:
					
					 No matter how desperately the south Korean puppet forces may distort history through such ceremony, they can never conceal the most disgraceful defeat they and their master suffered in history.
					
					 The service members of the puppet army feel extremely worn out and uneasy in the face of a series of strong military measures taken by the DPRK to cope with the provocative challenges of the hostile forces and are seized with fear and despair over approaching death.
					
					 What the Park Geun Hye group are doing now is nothing but the last-ditch efforts of the doomed. It is little short of spitting at their own faces.
					
					 The puppet forces will never be able to escape their doom in the face of the merciless and deadly strikes of the powerful Paektusan revolutionary army anytime and anywhere.
					
					 The Park group are going ever more mad in their moves to ignite a new war in league with their master, concealing the heavy defeat they suffered in the past Korean war, but it is as foolish an act as digging up a pitfall of ruin by themselves.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Condemns Park Geun Hye Group's Sycophancy toward U.S., Dependence on Foreign Forces
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Condemns Park Geun Hye Group's Sycophancy toward U.S., Dependence on Foreign Forces
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- The present north-south relations driven into the worst phase in history are an inevitable product of the treacherous acts of the Park Geun Hye group of traitors as they have escalated the confrontation with the compatriots in the north while pursuing sycophancy toward the U.S. and dependence on foreign forces quite contrary to the spirit of By Our Nation Itself, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 The above-said behaviors of the Park group are acts of treachery as they have made the inter-Korean relations a plaything of outsiders keen to carry out their strategy for dominating the whole of Korea quite contrary to the desire of all Koreans for independent reunification and anti-reunification acts of obstructing the dialogue and improved relations between the north and the south and escalating mistrust and confrontation with the backing of the U.S., the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 They are, at the same time, heinous acts of disturbing peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and increasing the danger of a nuclear war while sympathizing with the U.S. scenario for invading the DPRK.
					
					 Unpardonable are the thrice-cursed crimes the Park group of traitors have committed by pushing the inter-Korean relations to an inescapable catastrophe while seeking the ambition for doing harm to the fellow countrymen in the north with the backing of foreign forces. 
					
					 The resentment and hatred of the south Korean people against the Park group are running high.
					
					 The Park group will not be able to escape a disgraceful end, cursed and denounced by the whole nation for what they are doing at present.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams U.S. Artifice to Cover up Its True Colors as Nuclear Criminal
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams U.S. Artifice to Cover up Its True Colors as Nuclear Criminal
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- The true colors of the U.S. as a nuclear criminal are being brought to light in succession.
					 The Western media including the U.S. reported recently that the U.S. administration is busy conducting an "operation" to build up public opinion warning China of the danger of development of nuclear weapons by Japan and south Korea in a bid to hold in check the DPRK's nuclear development.
					
					 It was reported that U.S. Vice-President Joseph Baiden "advised" a Chinese high-ranking official at talks in last June that Japan might set about developing nukes in case Beijing fails to proactively buckle down to resolving the nuclear issue of the DPRK. 
					
					 U.S. officials concerned with security vied with each other in uttering that "Obama would stress at the G20 summit to be held in Hangzhou, China the DPRK's nuclear development might cause Japan and south Korea to develop nukes."
					
					 This only betrays the deceptive trick of the U.S. to cover its criminal nature as a world nuclear proliferator and divert the attention of the international community elsewhere.
					
					 Not content with making Japan and south Korea awash with its strategic and tactical nuclear weapons as the case is same with Europe and the Middle East, the U.S. is prodding its allies into nuclear weaponization.
					
					 It turned Japan and south Korea into the world's biggest nuclear arsenals by systematically introducing and deploying nukes in the middle of the last century, i.e. long before the DPRK's access to them.
					
					 It introduced nukes into south Korea in 1950 and turned it into a nuclear arsenal stockpiled with over 1 720 nukes in the middle of the 1980s.
					
					 It worked out a policy on deploying nukes in Japan in the 1950s and made with the Japanese authorities a secret agreement on permitting its introduction of nukes into Japan.
					
					 Washington has reached its extreme phase in its nuclear arms buildup by zealously egging its allies on to develop nuclear weapons.
					
					 It helped Japan stockpile plutonium enough to manufacture thousands of nuclear weapons by overlooking its moves to stockpile plutonium since long before.
					
					 It handed over 201 technological documents useful for designing, simulating and manufacturing A-bomb to south Korea via the Combustion Engineering Company. It concluded an agreement with south Korea, paving the way for the puppet forces to conduct uranium enrichment and reprocessing of nuclear fuel and to develop means for nuclear delivery.
					
					 South Korean experts are now openly claiming that south Korea placed the tenth in its capability to make nukes, adding that it is capable of making one nuke in three months and that its uranium enriching technology is at the "world's level".
					
					 It was none other than the U.S. that compelled the DPRK to have access to nuclear weapons by pursuing the worst-ever nuclear war policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 It is the height of shamelessness for the U.S. to talk about someone's "responsibility."
					
					 Its real aim is to realize its hegemonic ambition in the Asia-Pacific from A to Z.
					
					 Its scenario is to evade the responsibility for pushing the DPRK to its access to nukes and its nuclear muscle-flexing and, at the same time, to spark a new nuclear arms race in the Asia-Pacific by instigating its allies.
					
					 No country in the region will be taken in by such sleight of hand employed by the U.S.

articles.title: S. Korean Opposition Party Heavyweight Chides Park Geun Hye's Crimes
articles.content:
S. Korean Opposition Party Heavyweight Chides Park Geun Hye's Crimes
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the Emergency Measure Committee of the opposition Kukmin Party of south Korea in a speech made at the "National Assembly" on Sept. 7 condemned Park Geun Hye for her wrongdoings during her office, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 He said that three and half years of her office were days of pain and trouble, adding that this period witnessed three major crises such as violation of democracy, deterioration of economy of common people and collapse of inter-Korean relations.
					
					 He asserted that the "president" was to blame for all problems in south Korea.
					
					 The "government" should be wholly responsible for the conflict caused by the issue of THAAD deployment, he noted, calling for forming an ad hoc committee for judicial reforms at the NA in order to carry out reforms in prosecution and judicature.

articles.title: Koreans in China Celebrate DPRK's Founding Anniversary
articles.content:
Koreans in China Celebrate DPRK's Founding Anniversary
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- There was a meeting of the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China at the DPRK embassy in Beijing on Sept. 7 on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 It was attended by the chairman and vice-chairmen of the Regional Association and other Koreans in China.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket before a full-length picture of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing together and paid tribute to them.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted there.
					
					 Then the participants were briefed on the feats performed by the great leaders in founding and developing the DPRK.

articles.title: Korean Body in China Vows to Struggle against Park Geun Hye Regime
articles.content:
Korean Body in China Vows to Struggle against Park Geun Hye Regime
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China made public a statement on Sept. 7.
					 Denouncing the Park Geun Hye group of traitors in south Korea for deciding to deploy THAAD in south Korea despite strong criticism and protest by the public at home and abroad, the statement said:
					
					 The General Association of Koreans in China resolutely rejects the moves to deploy THAAD, terming it an act of wrecking peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula, bringing the danger of a war and openly challenging the international community.
					
					 With no desperate moves to arrest the just struggle of the overseas Koreans can the Park Geun Hye group dampen the enthusiasm of all Koreans to struggle for justice, truth and peace.
					
					 The association will turn out in the struggle to hold in check the THAAD deployment, eliminate the group of sycophants and traitors like Park Geun Hye, achieve peace and security on the Korean peninsula, improve the inter-Korean relations and reunify the country by the concerted efforts of all Koreans.

articles.title: Korean Resident in China Calls for Punishing Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
Korean Resident in China Calls for Punishing Park Geun Hye
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- Rim Myong Sun, vice-chairperson of the Mudanjiang Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China, in a statement on Sept. 5 called for punishing top class traitor Park Geun Hye of south Korea.
					 The statement said that no sooner had Park become the "president" by making a mockery of the south Korean people through illegal actions and trickery than she turned the whole of south Korea into a cesspool of irregularities and corruption by reviving the "yusin" dictatorship.
					
					 The statement painted Park Geun Hye as a prostitute clinging to the trousers of her American master and as a running dog of the U.S. and Chongwadae witch as she is keen on turning south Korea into a theatre of a nuclear war by introducing even THAAD into south Korea.
					
					 It also accused the top class traitor of branding the activities of the lawmakers from the opposition parties to protest against the deployment of THAAD as "neo-flunkeyism".
					
					 This clearly shows how desperately Park and her dogs are running amuck to justify the deployment of THAAD playing to the tune of their American master, the statement said.
					
					 The statement expressed the will of the entire women nationals of the Regional Association to carry on their struggle till Park going reckless like a rabid dog is finished off.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Report to 7th Congress of WPK Introduced in Tanzania
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Report to 7th Congress of WPK Introduced in Tanzania
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- The Tanzanian newspaper Uhuru carried "4. For Global Independence" of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's Report to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the Work of the Central Committee on September 7 on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 It also carried a photo of Kim Jong Un making the speech at the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of DPRK Celebrated in Peru
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of DPRK Celebrated in Peru
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- A national meeting of Peru took place in Lima on September 6 on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Present there were the chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, president of the Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union, secretary general of the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, chairman of the Peru-Korea Friendship Institute for Study of the Juche Based Songun Policy, executive member and general secretary of the Port Trade Union of the Peruvian General Federation of Workers and other personages of political parties, bodies and institutions and masses and the DPRK ambassador to Peru and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Speakers at the event praised President Kim Il Sung for defeating the U.S. and Japanese imperialism and building a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-defensive in national defence and leader Kim Jong Il for victoriously leading the standoff with the U.S. to firmly protect the dignity and sovereignty of the country and the nation and Marshal Kim Jong Un for commanding the struggle of the Korean people for the final victory under the unfurled banner of Songun.
					
					 They praised the advantages of the socialist system in the DPRK where the people become master of everything and everything serves them and revealed the absurdity of anti-DPRK "human rights" racket of the U.S. and Western countries.
					
					 They referred to the validity and vitality of the idea and lines of the peerlessly great men for reunification of Korea and the struggle of the Korean people for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: Yankees, Go Home: Swiss Bodies
articles.content:
Yankees, Go Home: Swiss Bodies
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- Yankees, go home!
					 The Swiss Preparatory Committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in a joint statement on September 5 on the lapse of 71 years since the U.S. imperialist aggression forces occupied south Korea.
					
					 The statement said that the U.S. forces entered south Korea under the guise of "liberator" but, in fact, they were cruel colonial dominator that replaced the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 The U.S. has turned south Korea into its gigantic military base for over 70 odd years, the statement noted.
					
					 The U.S. has threatened the DPRK, an independent and sovereign state, by illegally introducing nuclear weapons into south Korea, it said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. ignited the Korean war in the 1950s to occupy the whole of the Korean peninsula but was brought to its knees by the Korean people who fought under the outstanding leadership of the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The Korean people dynamically struggled to reunify the country under the wise guidance of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The respected Marshal Kim Jong Un will certainly bring a prosperous reunified power to the Korean people.

articles.title: Russian Body Congratulates Successful Nuclear Warhead Explosion Test of DPRK
articles.content:
Russian Body Congratulates Successful Nuclear Warhead Explosion Test of DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- The Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK issued a statement on September 9 in congratulation of the DPRK's successful nuclear warhead explosion test.
					 The statement said that all the members of the group warmly congratulated the leadership of the DPRK and all the Korean people on their brilliant success in the nuclear warhead explosion test.
					
					 We fully support the strong and brave determination of the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un who is taking measures for bolstering nuclear deterrence for self-defense as an answer to the U.S. policy of aggression against the DPRK and to the forces kowtowing to the U.S., the statement said, adding:
					
					 The progressive countries of the world know well how the DPRK emerged as a legitimate nuclear weapons state.
					
					 The DPRK's succeeding in the nuclear warhead explosion test in the wake of the successful launch of ballistic rockets is a demonstration of the might of Juche Korea bringing earlier the building of a socialist power.
					
					 Under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un the Korean people succeeded in H-bomb test, the test-fire of ground-to-ground medium- and long-range strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-10 and nuclear warhead explosion test, standing on the new ground for strengthening the capabilities for self-defense.
					
					 We, significantly celebrating the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK together with the Korean people, hope the DPRK will bolster the defense capabilities of the country and build a prosperous socialist power at an early date.

articles.title: Presidente de Tatarstan expresa decision de desarrollar amistad con RPDC
articles.content:
Presidente de Tatarstan expresa decision de desarrollar amistad con RPDC
Pyongyang, 12 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El embajador coreano en Rusia, Kim Hyong Jun, realizo el dia 5 una visita de cortesia al Presidente de la Republica de Tatarstan de la Federacion Rusa, Rustam Minnijanov.
					 En la ocasion el mandatario recordo que cuando visito a Corea en marzo de 2014, pudo presenciar la realidad de la Corea del Juche que se desarrolla cada dia mas bajo la direccion del Presidente Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Deseando la paz y estabilidad en la Peninsula Coreana, expreso la decision de fortalecer el intercambio y la cooperacion entre Rusia y Corea y desarrollar mas la tradicional amistad entre los dos paises.

articles.title: Portavoz del CRPP condena disparates de banda de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Portavoz del CRPP condena disparates de banda de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 12 de septiembre (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la ACNC formulada en relacion con que la banda de Park Geun-hye desvia la opinion publica hablando de la "situacion del brusco cambio en el Norte", el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria dio el dia 12 a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					 La horda traidora de Park Geun-hye, atemorizada completamente ante el poderio de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que avanza logrando siempre victorias, pronuncia locuras en el estado falto de inteligencia.
					
					 Esto es la conducta asquerosa del ignorante politico que no tiene un conocimiento elemental ni sano juicio.
					
					 Los tipejos presentados por la banda titere surcoreana como testigos de la supuesta "situacion del brusco cambio en el Norte", son los criminales sucios que se fugaron al Sur de Corea abandonado la patria y sus padres y hermanos para evitar el castigo legal por sus crimenes pesados.
					
					  Es muy natural que tales escorias humanas se vayan al Sur de Corea, mundo corrupto como el basurero.
					
					  Hoy, el lugar que se halla en visperas del derrumbe de regimen y la situacion del brusco cambio, es precisamente el Sur de Corea donde el rencor y la indignacion del pueblo estan a punto de explosion debido a los actos vendepatrias y serviles a grandes potencias, las maniobras de confrontacion fratricida, la dictadura fascista y las politicas antipopulares de la banda de Park Geun-hye.
					
					  Es muy pobre la horda traidora de Park que no abandona todavia el sueno absurdo del "derrumbe del Norte" sin conocer su situacion miserable igual a la vela batida por el viento.
					
					  Park Geun-hye y sus compinches nunca pueden ver exactamente ni comprender la realidad maravillosa de la RPDC que exalta la dignidad y el aspecto majestuoso de la potencia nuclear del Oriente y potencia socialista basada en la unidad monolitica entre el lider, el partido y las masas.
					
					  La banda de Park debe mantener cerrada su boca conociendo correctamente su destino tragico.

articles.title: Canciller coreano y su comitiva parten para participar en reuniones internacionales
articles.content:
Canciller coreano y su comitiva parten para participar en reuniones internacionales
Pyongyang, 12 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Yong Ho, y su comitiva salieron hoy de esta capital para tomar parte en la reunion ministerial previa a la 17a cumbre del MNOAL y en el 71o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU.

articles.title: Arriba a Pyongyang funcionario de PNUD
articles.content:
Arriba a Pyongyang funcionario de PNUD
Pyongyang, 12 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Llegaron el dia 12 a esta capital Haoliang Xu, administrador asistente del Programa de las Naciones Unidas para el Desarrollo (PNUD) y director del Buro Regional de Asia-Pacifico, y su comitiva.
